feed.title: Air Accidents Investigation Branch - Activity on GOV.UK

entry.title: The AAIB has sent a team to Rochdale, Greater Manchester
entry.summary: An investigation into an accident involving a light aircraft has begun

entry.title: Anniversary Statement: ATR-72-212, G-ISLM
entry.summary: Multiple electrical system failures on departure from Guernsey Airport on 10 January 2025

entry.title: Independent report: AAIB Record-only UAS investigations reviewed: October - November 2025
entry.summary: This is a list of AAIB Record-only UAS investigations that were reviewed during October - November 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Jodel D120, G-AYGG
entry.summary: Loss of control in-flight after reported engine failure, Belhus Woods Country Park, Essex, 7 September 2024

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Cameron Z-275, G-VBFT
entry.summary: Balloon struck unseen power lines during landing, Earls Colne, Essex, 10 April 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Ikarus C42 FB80, G-CGNI
entry.summary: Right wing not correctly installed, Yatesbury Airfield, Wiltshire, 9 May 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Airbus A320-251N, G-UZEF
entry.summary: Aircraft did not pressurise, south-western UK airspace, 20 April 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Airbus A380-841, G-XLEI
entry.summary: Turbulence encounter over the Atlantic Ocean, south of Greenland, 6 December 2024

entry.title: Independent report: Air accident monthly bulletin January 2026
entry.summary: The AAIB Bulletin is a compilation of AAIB reports and is published on the second Thursday of the month

entry.title: Anniversary Statement: Rockwell Commander 112 TCA, N4698W
entry.summary: Investigation of Rockwell Commander 112 TCA fatal accident, near Fife Airport on 23 December 2024

entry.title: Anniversary Statement: ATR 72-212 A, G-CMMK
entry.summary: Aircraft suffered damaged nose landing gear on landing at Belfast City Airport on 22 December 2024

entry.title: Corporate report: AAIB Current field investigations
entry.summary: Accidents and incidents under investigation by AAIB listed by date, giving a description and status of investigation

entry.title: Independent report: Air accident monthly bulletin December 2025
entry.summary: The AAIB Bulletin is a compilation of AAIB reports and is published on the second Thursday of the month.

entry.title: Independent report: AAIB Record-only investigations reviewed: September - October 2025
entry.summary: This is a list of AAIB Record-only investigations that were reviewed during September - October 2025.

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Tekever AR5 Evolution MK 2.3, G-TEKG
entry.summary: Loss of ground control station power, Lydd (London Ashford) Airport, 14 February 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Boeing 737-8AS, 9H-QAA
entry.summary: Aircraft pushed back into blast fence at London Stansted Airport, 21 August 2024

entry.title: AAIB Report: Cozy Mk IV, G-BYLZ
entry.summary: Loss of engine power on final approach, Gloucestershire Airport, 18 March 2025

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Cozy Mk IV, G-BYLZ
entry.summary: Cozy Mk IV (G-BYLZ), loss of engine power on final approach, Gloucestershire Airport, 18 March 2025

entry.title: AAIB Report: Spitfire Mk 26B, G-ENAA
entry.summary: Fatal accident involving a Spitfire MK 26B, Enstone Airfield, Oxfordshire, 28 July 2024

entry.title: AAIB investigation to Spitfire Mk 26B, G-ENAA
entry.summary: Spitfire MK 26B (G-ENAA), yawed and rolled left during takeoff causing it to strike the ground, Enstone Airfield, Oxfordshire, 28 July 2024
